short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Etsy reviews from the product listing page to a CSV file with one click, both the item reviews or shop reviews

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Effortlessly export Etsy reviews!

🔧 How it Works:
1️⃣ Open an Etsy product listing page.
2️⃣ Click open our extension, then click the Export button.
3️⃣ Done! Sit back and just wait a moment, let our extension handle the rest.

🔥 Key Features:
1️⃣ Run in the background without waiting for finish.
2️⃣ Export on multiple listing pages simultaneous.
3️⃣ Export reviews for current item
4️⃣ Export reviews for the shop

🎯 Targeted Users: Etsy store owners, data analysts, and competitor researchers alike.

💡 Benefit from our dedicated support team! We're here to assist you at every step and provide prompt, knowledgeable help.

💪 Take control of your business data management and make informed decisions with Etsy Product Review Exporter today!

Note: This extension is an independent creation and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Etsy. ❗️🔒
